channel.title: Source "running" error help please
channel.description:
this is what it says when i run the server, and all people get an all black screen, what do i need to change::
Edgeville Pking is now Online Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "7 7 7" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:282) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:117) Connection from cpe-98-30-222-22.woh.res.rr.com:51823 Jay: character file not found.
rune-lo-cus and mopar both say its online but nobody can log on. why

item.title: Source "running" error help please
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

You put your java version.

Read full topic

item.title: Source "running" error help please
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Change the

“C:\Program Files\Java[B]jdk1.6.0_14[/B]\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java

Jdk1.6.0_14 change the 14 to what ever your java thing is so say 12? or 7? or idk.

Read full topic

item.title: Source "running" error help please
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

well you obviously did something that the server doesnt recognize. try undoing what u just did.

Read full topic
